forest_entrance.description: You step into the lush forest. Birds chirp in the trees.

items.name: Healing Herb
items.description: A small herb that restores 20 HP when used.

deep_forest.description: The forest thickens here. Shadows move between the trees.

forest_clearing.description: A sunlit clearing opens before you. The air feels strange.

items.name: Rusty Sword
items.description: An old sword left by another adventurer. Increases attack.
